title: Developing DNA-barcodes for ecologically important eukaryotic microbes
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This project is ongoing and only recently begun so findings are as yet incomplete and there has as yet been no opportunity for them to be used.
findingsText: This project has only just begun such that there are no new findings to report at this stage It is too early to say Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment
